â€‰ Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com Kylie Jenner's luxury vacation on a yacht in Greece isn't just for the adults. She also brought her daughter Stormi, seven, along for the ride and the two of them are having a blast. On Sunday, the Kardashians star, 27, shared a video to Instagram captioned 'built-in-bestie for life,' with an infinity symbol emoji. She also shared the video to TikTok where she captioned it, 'can't see our haters from here.' In the clip, the mother and daughter duo dance around in circles on the yacht while wearing robes with towels on their heads. When they tire of the dancing, they flop down on the cushions while the song Heaven Must Have Lost and Angel by Tavares plays in the background. Kylie, who is also mom to Aire Webster, three, with ex-boyfriend Travis Scott, also shared videos of Stormi arriving in Greece. She cheekily captioned that video, 'I want to be her.' The Kylie Cosmetics founder also shared a video of Stormi going down the huge slide off the yacht into the sea. The girls trip included four of Kylie's friends including her bestie Stassie Karanikolaou, 28. She shared a carousel of images earlier on Sunday of her time with the adults on the yacht. 'Greeeece,' the mom of two captioned that update. In the first image, The Kardashians star wore a tiny yellow and black Chanel string bikini as she sat on her knees on the yacht. Kylie tipped her head to one side in the shot and looked like she was rolling her eyes. In another snap, the reality TV star showered off as she climbed back onto the boat after a swim in the sea. KhloÃ© Kardashian commented on her sister's post: 'Are you ever coming home?' A fan also mentioned seeing her on the yacht, writing, 'We saw your yacht in paxos!!! We drove past on a boat. hope ur having the best time.' A bunch of other fans commented along the lines of 'Oh girl your life is so fun' and 'what a life.' And many others complimented her beauty with comments such as 'How is someone this perfect' and 'sun-kissed beauty â¤ï¸.' Kylie's trip to Greece comes after she introduced her collaboration with Frankie's Bikinis. The new swimwear collaboration is called Cloud Cups by Frankies Bikinis x KHY. 'I've always loved Frankies Bikinis, and I'm so excited to partner with them to create this collection â€“ with incredibly flattering silhouettes in super soft material, these are the perfect pieces for summer,' Kylie told DailyMail.com in a statement. 'We've incorporated so many fun prints â€“ from polka dots to leopard â€“ and the styles are so comfortable, it feels like they float on your skin while lifting and sculpting.'

â€‰ SPR_COMBO[id]JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Artis El Rumi memberikan ucapan manis dan kejutan istimewa untuk sang kekasih, Syifa Hadju, yang berulang tahun ke-25 pada Minggu (13/7/2025) kemarin. El pun mengunggah foto-foto kebersamaannya dengan Syifa di Instagram-nya. â€œSelamat ulang tahun untuk cinta dalam hidupku @syifahadju,â€ tulis El Rumi dalam keterangan unggahannya, dikutip Kompas.com, Senin (14/7/2025). Baca juga: El Rumi Sudah Dapat Izin Ahmad Dhani dan Maia Estianty Adu Tinju Lagi dengan Jefri Nichol El juga menyampaikan doa agar Syifa selalu dikelilingi oleh kebahagiaan dan sukacita. â€œBerharap kamu mendapatkan segala sesuatu yang membawa kamu kebahagiaan dan sukacita karena kamu layak mendapatkan semua kebaikan yang ditawarkan dunia ini,â€ tulis El. El mengatakan, ia merasa aman dan menyenangkan bersama Syifa Hadju. El bersyukur karena kini ia masih bersama Syifa. Baca juga: Persiapan Makin Matang Jelang Duel Tinju, El Rumi Enggan Pamer Latihan di Medsos â€œKamu adalah cinta dalam bentuknya yang paling sejati, kamu membuat cinta terasa aman dan menyenangkan sekaligus, dan aku berterima kasih kepada alam semesta setiap hari untukmu. Ini untuk merayakan hari ini dan selalu. Sekali lagi, selamat ulang tahun Bebe,â€ tutur El. Tak hanya lewat unggahan, El juga memberikan kejutan secara langsung. Baca juga: Dilarang Maia Estianty Tanding Tinju Tanpa Pelindung Kepala, El Rumi: Aku Sih Pengin Enggak Pakai Dalam Instagram Story miliknya, terlihat momen saat El membawa kue dan buket bunga untuk merayakan hari spesial Syifa. Yang mencuri perhatian, El juga memberikan hadiah mewah berupa tas Chanel untuk Syifa. Momen pemberian kado tersebut turut diabadikan oleh sahabat-sahabat mereka dan diunggah di media sosial. Simak breaking news dan berita pilihan kami langsung di ponselmu. Pilih saluran andalanmu akses berita Kompas.com WhatsApp Channel : https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaFPbedBPzjZrk13HO3D. Pastikan kamu sudah install aplikasi WhatsApp ya.
